Class GroupService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.cloud.sdk.server.services.dsl.GroupService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterService<GroupFilter,GroupMetadata>, QueryService<Group,GroupFilter,GroupMetadata>

    public class GroupService
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryService<Group,GroupFilter,GroupMetadata>
    Service provide operations for query and manipulate groups of servers
